content: This is just a reminder that you can sign up to phone bank, canvass, get trainings  or take other actions at https://events.democrats.org/ in your state or in one of our battleground states (NC, PA, GA, NH, WI, PA, MI, AZ, NV). Volunteers like you make all the difference! We look forward to seeing you at an event soon.
## [Hawai'i Voter Information](https://www.vote.org/state/georgia/)
Pinned a message.

<a:star_wave:1269735420359606369> Hey, Team! We know you want to help make a difference! Did you know though that hosting a debate watch party is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465> It‚Äôs all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004>  [Register your watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) to get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/). <a:ThanksRainbow:1278765693579431967>

<a:yayfox:1269679649764675604> Hey, Team! We know you want to help **make a difference!** Did you know though that [hosting a debate watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465>  It‚Äôs all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004> 

<a:hypeparty:1279823205774921880> And, sign up by September 4th and you should get **free swag** (a separate form be sent to you for this after you register). <:eyes:1252803301137842251> You will also get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/) <a:tt_clapCat_OwO:1279822739242487871>

<:bluewave3:1270555729836900453>  Aloha Hawaiians , I am helping with debate related content in the HI official Facebook group.  I may put some of it here too.  What content would you want to see that relates specifically to HI  <:bluewave3:1270555729836900453> ?
I found this art in our approved <#1250876565366243348> (supporter content) channel, which you can join when you complete online engagement training.  Artist credit marcie0795.
Let's get a volunteer wave going! Repond on a thread with how many events you signed up to! Let's make the goal 5+ https://www.mobilize.us/events/hawaii-volunteer-opportunities/

I noted this is an in-person Text Bank event in Honolulu, and it is sponsored by affiliated orgs Working Families Party and Indivisible, but it is still DNC-approved. https://www.mobilize.us/mobilize/event/672309/ AND https://www.mobilize.us/workingfamilies/event/545747/

Hey everyone : 
The moderators of www.reddit.com/r/VoteDem and r/Bluemidterm2018 (the FORMER moderators of r/Voteblue) made this amazing spreadsheet:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jxO8g7q9VO3ZMAABcrvR7PMyX4Yl6dgIYhD3eRTKk1M/edit?usp=sharing
This Google Sheet has links to the sign up pages for HUNDREDS of opportunities to engage from home for campaigns across the country. Check it out and sign up! Let's keep going to build this BLUE WAVE!

On this day 4 years ago, a record 3.3 million Americans cast their ballot early.  And as expected, only 1.7 million early votes have been cast (a 45% decrease).  Please use the link below or call the Democratic Voter Assistance Hotline 9am-9pm (EST) (1-833-336-8683) to request an absentee ballot, or make a plan to vote early or on election day.  https://iwillvote.com/
So glad to see this. Saving.  Thank you for sharing.
Want to join me for this event? https://mobilize.us/s/PNzBX2

<:mega2:1269006580976976076> A reminder that we have a dedicated ‚Å†https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1288163431911788586 Reddit channel where we coordinate our efforts to post campaign content, leave comments, and upvote <:kamala1:1269028302203523114> <:WalzSmile:1270424129853456445> -related posts. Right now even supportive subreddits like r/politics are bombarded with Trump info, and we're trying to change that. Let's help people find information about our candidates and the brighter future they offer! Head on over to our channel and we'll plug you in with opportunities to contribute. Even if you have just one minute to help, you can make a difference.

## We're back! We're getting SO close to our goal of 5 million goals and have one more hour to call west coast voters - [please come join us](https://democrats.call.scaletowin.com/?t=09bd534e-841d-495f-b590-68e74150764e&ef=discord) to call NV voters! Even a few calls helps us reach our goal. ü§©

Happy Monday!

 We made almost 5 million calls this weekend to celebrate Kamala's birthday!
